title: Certificate of insurance as proof; mandatory, when
context: [ยง287-22.1] Certificate of insurance as proof; mandatory, when. Any person required to show proof of financial responsibility pursuant to section 287-20(a)(3) shall show proof by filing a certificate of insurance pursuant to section 287-22, or, if the person is a nonresident, section 287-23. [L 1985, c 195, ยง1]
